Notes: Planet-like objects that feature a large Pull Star inside them. The player can use the pointer on the Pull Star to make it attract them. UFOBlueStarCupsule is hardcoded to use a lower target radius.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_B.Description: If used, it will not rotate or move on its path while this switch is activated.

SW_PARAM.Description: The path movement speed is adjusted with ParamScale while this switch is activated.

DemoCast.Description: Appears if the action is activated.

BaseMtxFollowTarget.Description: Objects of this class can be followed by another BaseMtxFollower object.
